aim_node.description: [string]Node from which we calculate yaw and pitch, default head, must have -z fwd, +x up +y left.

aim_constraint_parent.description: [string]The node used as forward when calculating look angles.

lose_target_look_angle.description: The angle at witch the head will return to rest position (straight ahead).

lose_target_time.description: The time the target must be lost before the head returns to rest position (straight ahead).

treat_as_direction.description: [bool]If set, the aim constraint is treated as a direciton, not a point.
